sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from '../project'; @Component({ selector: 'app-filter', templateUrl: './filter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./filter.component.css'] }) export class FilterComponent { @Input() projects: Project[] = []; @Input() filters: Array = [""]; item: string = ""; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { } getItem(item: string) { this.item = item; console.log(this.item); } }
